mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FILES WHERE SEQ IN (SELECT MIN(SEQ) FROM FILES GROUP BY PARENTSEQ)
SELECT F.* FROM ITEMS I INNER JOIN FILES F ON(I.ISEQ =F.PARENTSEQ) WHERE SELLERID =#{id} AND SEQ IN (SELECT MIN(SEQ) FROM FILES GROUP BY PARENTSEQ) ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT * FROM FILES WHERE SEQ IN (SELECT MIN(SEQ) AS SEQ FROM (SELECT F.*, I.CATEGORY FROM FILES F LEFT OUTER JOIN ITEMS I ON F.PARENTSEQ = I.ISEQ WHERE CATEGORY = #{value} ORDER BY 1 DESC) GROUP BY PARENTSEQ)

SELECT * FROM FILES WHERE SEQ IN (SELECT MIN(SEQ) AS SEQ FROM (SELECT F.*, I.NAME FROM FILES F LEFT OUTER JOIN ITEMS I ON F.PARENTSEQ = I.ISEQ WHERE NAME LIKE '%'||#{value}||'%' OR CATEGORY LIKE '%'||#{value}||'%' OR EXAREA LIKE '%'||#{value}||'%'
ORDER BY 1 DESC) GROUP BY PARENTSEQ)
select * from files where seq in( select min(seq) from files where parentseq in (select iseq from items where iseq in (select ITEMS_NO from wishlist where buyer=#{value})) group by parentseq)
SELECT * FROM FILES WHERE parentSeq = #{value} and rownum=1
SELECT * FROM FILES WHERE SEQ IN (SELECT MIN(SEQ) FROM FILES WHERE PARENTSEQ IN (SELECT ITEMS_NO FROM SAFEDEAL WHERE BUYER =#{id})GROUP BY PARENTSEQ)
